title: PRD ReDesign: Information Pages
overview: This PRD defines the full set of development requirements for all Information Pages included in the DoktorABC platform redesign. These pages are core trust-building assets and serve as high-visibility entry points across marketing, SEO, and customer education.
implementation_requirement: Each page must be implemented as a pixel-perfect translation of the Figma design, with clear CMS control for translatable text and structured dynamic content.
multi_region_support: All pages must be fully integrated and deployed in France and Switzerland, using language-appropriate translations and ensuring that no UI element breaks the experience in any locale.

requirements: Every page must fully support DE and FR translations
Content must adapt to France and Switzerland without breaking layout or UI
All static text must be pulled from translation files or CMS fields

requirements.description: Display global sticky navbar: logo, search bar, account icon, cart icon, menu
Show breadcrumbs: Home → About → Shipping & Delivery
Background image, Title, Description paragraph, CTA: 'Go to medical questions'
Horizontal bar with shipping USPs: 2-hour express, Neutral packaging, Delivery depending on urgency, Medical privacy, Secure ordering, 1-2 days delivery, 24/7 service
Three cards: 2-hour express courier, DHL Express 24-48h, Pick up on site
Title with two sub-cards explaining what neutral packaging means and why
4-step visual explanation with icons and labels
6 shipping FAQs in accordion format
'Ready for your treatment?' section with Start Consultation button
Horizontal bar with key category icons
Display payment badges using SVG icons
Yellow highlighted notes block with shipping notes/legal disclaimer
Render full global footer with navigation, company info, certifications
Standard navigation components
Large background image, Title: 'DoktorABC Newsroom', Description, CTA, Trusted Shops score badge
PR contact card with name, position, email, phone number, center image
Section 'Our Media Kit' with 2 download items: Logo (brand assets), Visuals (images & graphics)
Grid of press articles from DB. Each card: thumbnail, author, date, title, excerpt. Sorted newest → oldest.
Loads next batch via pagination. Default: 6 (desktop), 3 (mobile)
Display research articles and medical studies
